description: Attention: only compatible on devices with ANDROID WEAR OPERATING SYSTEM.Favorite WearPet Electric Character.No official pokeball watch face for every pokemon fan, similar pikachu pet.What you see is what you get.V1.0 Watch face for round and square clock.Time Analogue in ambient and interactive mode.Digital time in interactive mode.Battery status, step counter and date in interactive mode.The ball opens to show the WearPetSound when opening and closing ballWearPet Greeting AppearSounds and gestures when touching the WearPetWearPet talk every hour on point (Interactive mode only)WearPet sleep late at night until the next day.Battery saver background in ambient mode.The sound only work on devices with speaker.
descriptionHTML:
Attention: only compatible on devices with ANDROID WEAR OPERATING SYSTEM.

Favorite WearPet Electric Character.
No official pokeball watch face for every pokemon fan, similar pikachu pet.
What you see is what you get.

V1.0 Watch face for round and square clock.
Time Analogue in ambient and interactive mode.
Digital time in interactive mode.
Battery status, step counter and date in interactive mode.
The ball opens to show the WearPet
Sound when opening and closing ball
WearPet Greeting Appear
Sounds and gestures when touching the WearPet
WearPet talk every hour on point (Interactive mode only)
WearPet sleep late at night until the next day.
Battery saver background in ambient mode.
The sound only work on devices with speaker.
comments: Gran aplicaci√≥n Ofrece lo que estaba buscando para mi smart watch.
recentChanges: - The size of the app is reduced.
